comment.author: 40472720@N00
comment._content: Jouett Shouse (December 10, 1879 - June 2, 1968) was an American lawyer, newspaper publisher, and leading Democratic politician. A conservative, he was best known for opposing the liberal New Deal in the 1930s. Elected to represent Kansas's 7th District in the United States House of Representatives, serving from 1915 to 1919. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jouett_Shouse
